trans-unit.source: Represents a set of line segments defined by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> with each <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> specifying the end point of a line segment.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组的直线线段定义<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>与每个<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>指定一条线段的终点。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to create a series of connected lines in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于在一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>中创建一系列连接的直线

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> class with the specified list of points that determine the line segments and a value indicating whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>类指定列表确定的直线线段和值，该值指示是否绘制线段的点。

trans-unit.source: A collection of points that determine the line segments of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定的直线线段的点的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the segment stroked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>..
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要进行描边; 的段否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>...

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structures that defines this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>定义此结构<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A line is drawn from the end point of the previous segment or, if this is the first segment, from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to the first point in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 从前一条线段的终结点绘制一条线或如果这是从第一条线段，<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>到此集合中的第一个点。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lines are then drawn between each subsequent point specified in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后指定此集合中每个后续点之间绘制连线。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The shape of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此形状<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>对象。
